Sentencas: Cu-based cermets suitable for electrodes in Symmetric and Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SR-SOFCs) based on the Cerium Gadolinum Oxide (CGO) electrolyte were developed and successfully tested in the intermediate temperature range (600-800 degrees C).
Titulo: Cu/CGO cermet based electrodes for Symmetric and Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The Cu/CGO cermets were prepared by means of a self-combustion based citrate procedure and the effects of synthesis conditions were studied.
Titulo: Cu/CGO cermet based electrodes for Symmetric and Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Characterization of the Cu/CGO nanocomposites by XPS, XRD, SEM, TPR suggested that this procedure allows obtaining highly dispersed CuO on the cerium gadolinium oxide.
Titulo: Cu/CGO cermet based electrodes for Symmetric and Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Conversion higher than 80% was observed above 600 degrees C in methane total oxidation.
Titulo: Cu/CGO cermet based electrodes for Symmetric and Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Synthesis parameters affected both properties and catalytic performance.
Titulo: Cu/CGO cermet based electrodes for Symmetric and Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The behaviour under redox conditions was studied by operando high-energy XRD under oscillating H-2/O-2 feed.
Titulo: Cu/CGO cermet based electrodes for Symmetric and Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Reducing conditions converted CuO into Cu(0) passing through an intermediate Cu2O phase while increasing the conductivity and the reactivity.
Titulo: Cu/CGO cermet based electrodes for Symmetric and Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This structural modification was completely reversible.
Titulo: Cu/CGO cermet based electrodes for Symmetric and Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The high stability, reversibility, catalytic activity and electrochemical performance make these electrodes promising for SR-SOFCs.
Titulo: Cu/CGO cermet based electrodes for Symmetric and Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
